nested.help: Currency must be a valid [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) three digit currency code. Example: `USD`.
nested.name: custom_data_currency
nested.label: Currency

nested.help: This could be a monetary value or a value in some other metric. Example: `142.54`.
nested.name: custom_data_value
nested.label: Value

spec.label:
Reminder:

You do not have to hash the following inputs with `sha256()`. We will do that for you.
